channel.title: How do I change these few things
channel.description:
How can I change these few things...-
The emote list (Where it says Dance, Wave, Spin, ect) - How do I change them? I can't seem to find it in the client.java so Im guessing it's something else.
Not bothered if you can explain with a tutorial link, or tell me what file it is to change them. Just please tell me which file holds the config for the emotes, so I can make my own & change the ones I alreayd have.
And Is it possible to change the map? Or edit it. If yeh, how?
Thanks :D [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 08:53:00 AM[/size][hr]I need an answer...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 08:54:25 AM[/size][hr]Ah. I need an answer pls ;[

item.title: How do I change these few things
item.dc:creator: @AndyJay123 AndyJay123
item.description:
@AndyJay123 wrote:

How can I change these few things…-

The emote list (Where it says Dance, Wave, Spin, ect) - How do I change them?
I can’t seem to find it in the client.java so Im guessing it’s something else.

Not bothered if you can explain with a tutorial link, or tell me what file it is to change them. Just please tell me which file holds the config for the emotes, so I can make my own & change the ones I alreayd have.

And
Is it possible to change the map? Or edit it. If yeh, how?

Thanks
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 08:53:00 AM[/size][hr]I need an answer…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 08:54:25 AM[/size][hr]Ah. I need an answer pls ;[
